text: Tomara'i srestha um'mata [1], manaba jatira jan'ya yadera bera kara hayeche; tomara satkajera nirdesa dibe, asatkaje nisedha karabe [2] ebam allahâ€Œra upara imana anabe [3]. Ara ahale kitabagana yadi imana anato tabe ta chila tadera jan'ya bhalo. Tadera madhye kichu sankhyaka mumina ache; kintu tadera adhikansa'i phaseka
